name: Canopy Guardian
text: Hexproof, Prowess
illustration: [An elemental creature made of leaves and branches, standing tall on a floating island, with the sky and other floating islands visible in the background.]
flavor: "In the ever-changing skies, the Canopy Guardians adapt and thrive, their movements as graceful as the wind itself."

name: Nimbus Veil
text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor: "As the wind whispered its secrets, the creature soared above, glimpsing the tapestry of fate."

name: Stormrider's Fury
text: Creatures you control have flying and haste.

name: Aetherflow Oracle
text: Aetherflow — Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay X. If you do, draw X cards.
flavor: "The aether's secrets are boundless, waiting to be unlocked by those who dare to delve into its depths."

name: Skyward Patrol
text: Skyward (This creature can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.)

name: Necrotic Grasp
text: Destroy target creature. You gain life equal to its toughness.
art description: The artwork depicts a sinister figure with outstretched hands, surrounded by dark energy, as they drain the life force from a creature in the sky.
flavor: "In the skies of Heajea, even death can be harnessed for power."

name: Soul Leecher
text: Hexproof
flavor: "In the skies of Heajea, even the shadows hunger for souls."

name: Skyward Swooper
text: Skyward (This creature can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.)

name: Whirling Tempest
text: Skyward 2 (This creature can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.)

name: Aerial Assault
text: Aerial Assault deals 2 damage to each creature with flying and each player.

name: Skyward Slinger
text: Skyward (This creature can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: "No wings? No problem. I'll bring them down from the sky myself."

name: Whims of the Wild
text: Choose one —

name: Aetherflow Dynamo
text: Aetherflow Dynamo enters the battlefield tapped.
{t}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Shadow Stalker
text: Shadow Stalker can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor: "In the darkness of the skies, the Shadow Stalker hunts unseen, preying on the weak and vulnerable."

name: Celestial Observatory
text: Celestial Observatory enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: "From the observatory's heights, we gain a glimpse of the heavens and the secrets they hold."

name: Skyshaper's Call
text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Cloud Guardian
text: Flying
{t}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Cloudstone Talisman
text: {T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {t}, sacrifice cloudstone talisman: Return target creature with flying from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "In the depths of the clouds, the talisman holds the key to reclaiming what was lost."

name: Aetherflow Shaman
text: Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay X. If you do, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature.
flavor: "Through the flow of aether, life's energy surges, empowering all who harness its essence."

name: Aerial Formation
text: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

name: Ebonwing, the Sky Reaper
text: Flying, Skyward 2 (This creature can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach).

name: Skyfire Elemental
text: Flying, prowess

name: Ascended Seraph
text: Flying, lifelink
note: The transformed side of the card, Ascended Seraph, represents the creature's growth and additional abilities as your life total increases.

name: Dark Bargain
text: Draw two cards, then lose 2 life.

name: Whirling Windmill
text: {T}: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until end of turn.

name: Nimbus Shield
text: Enchant creature
flavor: "With the nimbus shield, the skies themselves protect you."

name: Mistcaller
text: Flying
{1}{u}, tap: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor: "Through the misty skies, it sees the threads of fate and guides us towards the unknown."

name: Celestial Navigator
text: Flying, prowess

name: Verdant Explorer
text: When Verdant Explorer enters the battlefield, explore. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor: "Every step on these floating islands is a chance for discovery and growth."

name: Skyward Beacon
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {t}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "From the highest peaks, we can touch the sky and soar with the wind."
